name: EndlessFun
description:
A fun project made for the UAT Game Design Workshop Jam April 2023.

The Diversifiers I went for are 'Art' and 'You're not the main character'.

I got the award 'Most polished game' during the award ceremony for this submission!

Follow a short adventure of Dream. A friend of the now hero of the realm, Life. as she unknowingly falls into a trap of a book that Life had when Dream was visiting her.
